datecalc.name: 耗时计算
datecalc.brief_intro: 输入起止时间，计算所消耗的时间长度，可用于计算曲目传说/殿堂耗时。

zkcalc.name: 周刊算分
zkcalc.brief_intro: 周刊VOCALOID中文排行榜计分规则计算器。

ts.name: 时间戳转换
ts.brief_intro: 时间戳与时间字符串转换工具。

text-abid-description-replacement.name: 文本av号/bv号与视频描述替换
text-abid-description-replacement.brief_intro: 将文本中的av号或bv号替换为对应视频的描述信息（标题、UP主、播放数等等），支持自定义格式与微调。

datecalc.name: Timespan Calc
datecalc.brief_intro: Calc timespan with given start and end time. This can be used to calc time cost of 1M/10K view.

zkcalc.name: The Weekly Point Calc
zkcalc.brief_intro: Point calculator based on rules of the VC Weekly.

text-abid-description-replacement.name: Text Abid Description Replacement
text-abid-description-replacement.brief_intro: Replace aid or bvid with info (e.g. title, uploader, view, etc.) of corresponding video inside text. Support custom format and adjustment.
